Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT TBI Cartridge with the i-STAT Alinity System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the i-STAT TBI Cartridge with the i-STAT Alinity System, an in vitro diagnostic multiplex immunoassay for GFAP and UCH-L1 in whole blood to aid evaluation of suspected mild traumatic brain injury.
Indications for Use Summary: A panel of in vitro diagnostic immunoassays for quantitative measurement of GFAP and UCH-L1 in venous whole blood, using the i-STAT Alinity instrument, to assist in determining need for head CT scan in patients (18+ years) with suspected mild traumatic brain injury within 24 hours of injury.
